featured.text: One grateful client, an author, put a “thank you” to Jack in the front of his book.
Some people, however, are so grateful that they send extra money to Jack or to the charities his company supports.

definition.zh_def: 感激的，對某人或某事表示感謝的。
definition.en_def: Feeling or showing an appreciation for something done or received.
definition.example: I am grateful for your help during my difficult times.
